document.heading: Foster Care Goals Act Amendment Act of 1984

history.narrative: Law 5-107, the “Foster Care Goals Act Amendment Act of 1984,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-404, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 12, 1984, and June 26, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 29, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-149 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
